「譆！¶

雖然，¶

顏回曰：¶
「端而虛，¶
勉而一，¶
則可乎？」¶

# src: ZHUANG 4.1.17; Guo Qingfan 141; Wang Shumin 126; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 113
# dating: 8110
曰：¶
「惡！惡可！¶

「盡矣。¶
吾語若！¶

義也，¶

# src: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123
# dating: 8110
无適而非君也，¶	KR5c0126_004:1a:237:1:36,KR5g0071_002:005b:7:12:9
无所逃於天地之間。¶	KR1a0046_024:2a:6:1:15,KR1a0095_002:53b:7:10:1,KR5c0126_004:1a:238:1:36,KR5c0127_070:005b:5:3:22
是之謂大戒。¶	KR1a0102_008:1b:7:9:0,KR1h0017_024:1b:4:7:8,KR2b0017_073:1b:7:18:1,KR2c0021_094:12b:8:17:1,KR2d0023_032:26b:1:4:2,KR2d0023_033:9a:1:8:2,KR3a0064_055:4a:6:19:4,KR3k0056_001:3a:1:17:2,KR4h0106_023:25a:6:15:10,KR5c0126_004:1a:239:1:36,KR5c0127_007:012b:7:2:43,KR5c0128_005:015b:1:15:4,KR5c0134_001:021a:4:4:34,KR5c0135_005:010b:6:9:14,KR5c0136_003:016a:4:15:18,KR5c0138_002:11b:4:18:4,KR5c0139_005:029a:4:1:32,KR5h0057_002:011a:1:4:1,KR5h0057_002:012a:10:14:1,KR5i0036_002:02p038a:7:11:14,KR6s0075_003:0410b:1:20:32

『无遷令，¶
无勸成，¶

# dating: 8110

至矣。¶
何作為報也！¶	KR2c0021_094:14a:2:15:1,KR2d0023_032:27b:3:3:2,KR2d0023_033:10a:4:4:2,KR4h0106_023:26a:8:11:10,KR5c0126_004:1a:308:1:43,KR5c0138_002:13b:3:30:4
莫若為致命。¶	KR2c0021_094:14a:2:20:1,KR2d0023_032:27b:3:8:2,KR2d0023_033:10a:4:9:2,KR4h0106_023:26a:8:16:10,KR5c0126_004:1a:309:1:43,KR5c0138_002:13b:4:21:4,KR6s0075_003:0412b:8:25:37
此其難者。」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_004-9a>¶	KR2c0021_094:14a:3:4:1,KR2d0023_032:27b:3:13:2,KR2d0023_033:10a:4:14:2,KR2k0049_211:31a:8:12:18,KR2o0015_045:6b:8:7:19,KR3k0050_010:76b:8:5:22,KR4d0076_043:15a:8:12:9,KR4d0079_008:3a:5:20:7,KR4h0081_040:21a:3:18:36,KR4h0106_023:26a:8:21:10,KR4h0106_031:27a:5:12:37,KR4h0115_142:16b:7:12:30,KR4h0132_399:20b:2:12:11,KR4h0132_399:43b:2:12:23,KR5c0126_004:1a:310:1:43,KR5c0127_008:001b:5:7:2,KR5c0127_008:004b:6:16:2,KR5c0128_006:001a:7:9:2,KR5c0134_001:022a:6:16:35,KR5c0135_005:013a:3:14:16,KR5c0135_005:013a:5:15:16,KR5c0136_003:020b:5:10:23,KR5c0138_002:13b:4:26:4,KR5c0139_005:038a:5:6:41,KR5c0139_005:038a:8:2:41,KR5h0057_002:014a:10:9:1,KR5h0057_002:015b:2:12:1,KR5i0036_002:02p039b:5:16:14,KR5i0036_002:02p045a:1:7:14,KR6q0219_001:0033a:19:12:262,KR6s0075_003:0408b:7:21:26,KR6s0075_003:0410a:10:10:31,KR6s0075_003:0412b:9:4:37,KR6s0075_003:0412b:12:26:37

與之為无方，¶	KR1a0059_008:19b:5:3:0,KR5c0126_004:1a:315:1:44

與之為有方，¶	KR1a0102_014:5a:6:14:0,KR2c0021_075:9a:5:15:1,KR2d0006_103:52a:3:8:14,KR2d0015_012:8b:2:13:1,KR2d0023_014:27a:5:14:29,KR3k0025_070:16b:4:11:10,KR3k0056_005:45b:3:30:2,KR5c0126_004:1a:317:1:44,KR5c0138_002:13b:6:21:4,KR6s0075_003:0413a:5:24:39
則危吾身。¶	KR1a0102_014:5a:6:19:0,KR2c0021_075:9a:5:20:1,KR2d0006_103:52a:3:13:14,KR2d0015_012:8b:2:18:1,KR2d0023_014:27a:5:19:29,KR3j0178_002:6a:3:4:3,KR3k0025_070:16b:4:16:10,KR3k0056_005:45b:3:35:2,KR5c0126_004:1a:318:1:44,KR5c0127_008:007a:3:4:29,KR5c0127_008:008b:4:9:29,KR5c0128_006:002b:7:5:2,KR5c0134_001:022b:1:5:37,KR5c0135_005:013a:10:15:16,KR5c0136_003:021a:6:5:23,KR5c0138_002:13b:7:5:4,KR5c0139_005:038b:7:15:42,KR5g0071_002:005b:10:3:9,KR5h0057_002:016b:9:5:1,KR5i0036_002:02p039b:9:23:14,KR6s0075_003:0413a:6:5:39,KR6s0075_003:0413a:6:26:39

# src: ZHUANG 4.3.2; Guo Qingfan 164; Wang Shumin 145; Fang Yong 128; Chen Guying 128
# dating: 8110
其知適足以知人之過，¶	KR2c0021_075:9a:6:3:1,KR2d0006_103:52a:3:17:14,KR2d0023_014:27a:6:6:29,KR3k0056_005:45b:3:39:2,KR5c0126_004:1a:319:1:45,KR5c0127_008:007a:3:8:29,KR5c0128_006:002b:7:9:2,KR5c0134_001:022b:1:9:37,KR5c0135_005:013b:1:2:17,KR5c0136_003:021a:6:9:23,KR5c0138_002:14a:1:12:4,KR5c0139_005:039a:4:1:42,KR5i0036_002:02p039b:9:27:14,KR6s0075_003:0413a:7:4:39
而不知其所以過。¶	KR2c0021_075:9a:6:12:1,KR2d0006_103:52a:4:5:14,KR2d0015_012:8b:3:9:1,KR2d0023_014:27a:6:15:29,KR3k0056_005:45b:4:8:2,KR5c0126_004:1a:320:1:45,KR5c0127_008:007a:3:17:29,KR5c0127_008:008b:5:7:29,KR5c0127_008:009a:8:8:29,KR5c0128_006:002b:8:1:2,KR5c0134_001:022b:2:1:37,KR5c0135_005:013b:1:11:17,KR5c0136_003:021a:7:1:23,KR5c0138_002:14a:1:21:4,KR5c0139_005:039a:4:10:42,KR5h0057_002:016b:10:2:1,KR5i0036_002:02p039b:10:8:14,KR6s0075_003:0413a:7:15:39
若然者，吾柰之何？」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_004-10a>¶	KR5c0126_004:1a:321:1:45,KR5c0134_001:022b:2:8:37,KR5c0135_005:013b:2:1:17,KR5h0057_002:016b:10:9:1,KR6s0075_003:0413a:8:21:39

大枝折，¶

桂可食，¶
故伐之；¶
漆可用，¶
故割之。¶
